title: 癸卯新年好礼，爱来自基金会中分
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:simple-yonder]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:xmas
|xmas-snow= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
> 一起漫游整个世界观，造访在壬寅年一年里辛苦活跃工作的各位下层叙事人物和异常，
> 
> 在辞旧迎新之际，与他们共度愉快的假期吧，
> 
> 新年快乐！
> 
> 另：季节限定着装、--过于放松状态--预警——
> 
> 
> @@                                                                                                                      @@——欧豆
@@@@
@@@@
++ **悠闲出行时间**
@@@@
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 和Diana一起出门吧！| hide=○ 就等你啦]]
[[=image http://odeo.wikidot.com/local--files/odeooooo/laowuy.png]]
出镜：[[*user CaroyalKKaia]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ AnyboLancdon的书店邀约| hide=○ 新年第一本书📕]]
[[=image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/odeos/wuming]]
出镜：[[*user AnyboLancdon]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ Blank与她的好朋友| hide=○ 清晨的歌声]]
[[=image http://odeo.wikidot.com/local--files/odeooooo/bulankay]]
出镜：[[*user sylvia-blank]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

出镜：[[*user hoah2333]]和[[*user Dr Hormress]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 斯道尔的礼物| hide=○ 酒渍橘大优惠]]
[[=image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/odeos/juzi]]
出镜：[[*user Duststore]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 雪中出游的两人| hide=○ 雪地靴是冬日好选择]]
[[=image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/odeos/zuanguoyy]]
出镜：[[*user Chris Evertworth]]和[[*user Diamond_Apple]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 等待过久的天狼| hide=○ 店里有沙发]]
[[=image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/odeos/tianlang]]
出镜：[[*user Sirius Dawn]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 和叶莺一起逛街吧！| hide=○ 世界名画《欧豆提着购物袋》]]
[[=image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/odeos/yeying.png]]
出镜：[[*user Akikoe]]/[[*user Nightingale_FZ]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 罗久明邀你一起去唱片店| hide=○ 新年第一首歌🎵]]
[[=image http://odeo.wikidot.com/local--files/odeooooo/keshay.png]]
出镜：[[*user sciencekiller]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 新年第一抹甜蜜| hide=○ 来自赛博幽灵]]

出镜：[[*user two cat]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 一起去花市吗？| hide=○ 崭新的鲜亮色彩]]
[[=image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/odeos/shuiyiny.png]]
出镜：[[*user Mercuresphere]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 多元宇宙游人| hide=○ 新年习俗记录者]]
[[=image http://odeo.wikidot.com/local--files/odeooooo/daogey.png]]
出镜：[[*user DouglasLiu]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 音击社年终活动| hide=○ 奖品是鲨鱼玩偶]]

出镜：[[*user Jochoi]]和[[*user Etinjat]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ **舒服宅在站点**
@@@@

[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ **异常也要过节！**
@@@@

出镜：[[[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-2295| 缝心的熊]]]和[[[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-2801| 尛熋]]]

[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
